statements: DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_name = 'Sample Quiz';
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1 AND total_questions > 10;
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_name LIKE '%History%' OR quiz_description LIKE '%Ancient%';
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id IN (SELECT quiz_id FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions < 5);
DELETE FROM answers WHERE answer_id = 123 AND question_id = 456
DELETE FROM questions WHERE quiz_id IN (SELECT quiz_id FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_category = 'Science')
DELETE FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id NOT IN (SELECT quiz_id FROM questions)
DELETE FROM questions WHERE quiz_id = 1 AND points < 5;
DELETE FROM answers WHERE question_id IN (SELECT question_id FROM questions WHERE quiz_id = 1);
DELETE FROM answers WHERE question_id IN (SELECT question_id FROM questions WHERE quiz_id = 'e6ca91b3-033e-4e27-88cd-0d18c3abc886');
DELETE FROM results WHERE quiz_id = 'a7e0939c-0488-4785-990c-14745e9cd4d9' AND user_id = '0448bd38-f3a6-4b45-9f58-a491d7614082';
